description: This file defines the YahooFinanceService class, which provides a method to fetch stock quotes from Yahoo Finance's public API. It processes the JSON response to create a list of Quote objects, including additional logic to determine buy/sell/hold signals based on change percentages.

classes.name: YahooFinanceService
classes.description: A service class that fetches stock quote data from Yahoo Finance's public API.

methods.name: fetchQuotes
methods.description: Fetches quotes for a list of symbols from Yahoo Finance, processes the JSON response, and returns a list of Quote objects with computed signals.
